Authors: Sukarman H., Kan A.C., Fandi R.
Title: The analysis of value shop as a basic design of mobile applications in cirebon and surrounding areas
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 14480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Sukarman, H., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 14480, Indonesia; Kan, A.C., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 14480, Indonesia; Fandi, R., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 14480, Indonesia
Abstract: The improvement of prosperity in city can be achieved, among others, by increasing tourism activities. The city and regency of Cirebon were selected in this study to see the potential and the obstacles that occur to make these areas as tourist destination. Kertajati international airport is available, dozens of tourist destinations both for enjoying culinary, historical, religious sites, supporting adequate intercity and local transportation, and so on. The main problem for Cirebon for tourists who will or are visiting the city is the specific and clear information about the destination. The opportunity and obstacles to find the best solution are evaluated through the Value Shop system. The need for a mobile application framework that is well developed and backed with comprehensive data is proposed. The design of the application framework uses the OOAD process. It is hoped that this application framework will make it easy for prospective travelers to feel comfortable toward what they can get from the city and regency of Cirebon. In addition, the Population and the government of Cirebon city and regency will be able to boost their wealth. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Mobile application; The city and regency of cirebon; Tourism; Value shop
Index Keywords: Information management; Application frameworks; International airport; Mobile applications; Tourism activities; Tourist destinations; Mobile computing
